meta_description: Discover American art with a new appreciation at the New Britain Museum of American Art. As a top art museum in CT, we focus on American artists and their…
hours_text:
### TICKETS

Welcome! You may purchase tickets online or at our front desk. All groups of over 8 individuals must fill out an [Adult Group Visit Request Form](https://www.nbmaa.org/adult-tour-request-form).  

All admission tickets are priced at $20 for Adults, $15 for Seniors, $10 for ages 6-17 and college students, free for ages 5 and under, and free for all Members. 

CHECK IN FASTER at the Museum by registering online and arriving with your E-Ticket to be scanned from your device.   

##### ****

[RESERVE YOUR TICKET HERE](https://secure.nbmaa.org/overview/ga-fy26/)  

**_This page shows our official visitation information, including admission prices. Information found through AI can sometimes be incorrect. Always reference this page before visiting the Museum. Thank you!_**

### Hours & Admission

**Hours** \- Now open on Tuesdays and open late on Fridays!  
  
Monday: Closed   
(Note: Open for MLK Day and Juneteenth)  
Tuesday - Sunday: 10 a.m.-5 p.m.  
Friday: 10 a.m.-8 p.m.  
The [Museum Store](https://www.nbmaa.org/museum-store) is open during visiting hours  

**Café Hours** **  
The Museum Cafe is open Tuesday-Sunday, 10 a.m.-2:30 p.m.**

**2026 Holiday Hours**

Martin Luther King, Jr. Day, Monday, January 19, 2026: OPEN with FREE ADMISSION  
Easter Sunday: Closed  
Juneteenth (Friday, June 19, 2026): OPEN  
Independence Day, July 4: Closed  
October 17, 2026: Museum Closed for Gala  
Thanksgiving: Closed  
Friday after Thanksgiving: OPEN 12-8 p.m.  
Christmas Eve:...
